task.title: Extract BaseWrapper from PtyWrapper and TmuxWrapper

events.content: Using abstract class with protected methods for shared implementation: Using abstract class with protected methods for shared implementation

raw.question: Using abstract class with protected methods for shared implementation
raw.chosen: Using abstract class with protected methods for shared implementation
raw.reasoning: Allows subclasses to override while providing default behavior

events.content: Created BaseWrapper abstract class with comprehensive tests: Created BaseWrapper abstract class with comprehensive tests

raw.question: Created BaseWrapper abstract class with comprehensive tests
raw.chosen: Created BaseWrapper abstract class with comprehensive tests
raw.reasoning: Extracted shared functionality from PtyWrapper/TmuxWrapper into base class. Tests cover message queue, spawn/release, continuity, and relay command handling.

retrospective.summary: Extracted BaseWrapper abstract class from PtyWrapper and TmuxWrapper using TDD approach. Created 29 new tests, removed ~900 lines of duplicate code, both wrappers now inherit shared functionality.
